data.title: Morning Water Ritual
data.description: A daily morning ritual for spiritual cleansing and thanksgiving
data.content: Begin your day with gratitude and spiritual cleansing through sacred water.
data.steps: ["Fill a clean bowl with fresh water","Face the rising sun","Speak words of thanksgiving","Wash your hands and face with the water","Pour remaining water onto the earth"]
data.symbolic_meaning: Represents spiritual cleansing and the renewal of divine connection each morning.

data.title: Afternoon Libations
data.content: Connect with your ancestors through sacred water libations.
data.steps: ["Prepare clean water in a sacred vessel","Call upon your ancestors by name","Pour water onto the earth slowly","Speak your prayers and requests","Give thanks for ancestral guidance"]
data.symbolic_meaning: Maintains connection with ancestral spirits and honors their wisdom.

data.title: Night Water Cleansing
data.content: End your day with spiritual cleansing and honoring The Gods.
data.steps: ["Prepare a bath or basin of water","Add sacred herbs if available","Cleanse your body mindfully","Speak prayers to The Gods","Release the day's burdens"]
data.symbolic_meaning: Releases negative energy and prepares the spirit for rest and renewal.

data.title: Ancestral Libation
data.content: Honor your ancestors with sacred water offerings.

data.title: Purification Bath
data.content: Deep spiritual cleansing through sacred bathing.
